abomasnow.name: Abomasnow
abomasnow.description: It blankets wide areas in snow by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as "The Ice Monster."

abra.name: Abra
abra.description: Abra sleeps for eighteen hours a day. However, it can sense the presence of foes even while it is sleeping. In such a situation, this Pokémon immediately teleports to safety.

absol.name: Absol
absol.description: Every time Absol appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster Pokémon.

accelgor.name: Accelgor
accelgor.description: Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very light and can fight with ninja-like movements.

aegislash.name: Aegislash
aegislash.description: Generations of kings were attended by these Pokémon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokémon.

aerodactyl.name: Aerodactyl
aerodactyl.description: Aerodactyl is a Pokémon from the age of dinosaurs. It was regenerated from genetic material extracted from amber. It is imagined to have been the king of the skies in ancient times.

aggron.name: Aggron
aggron.description: Aggron claims an entire mountain as its own territory. It mercilessly beats up anything that violates its environment. This Pokémon vigilantly patrols its territory at all times.

aipom.name: Aipom
aipom.description: Aipom's tail ends in a hand-like appendage that can be cleverly manipulated. However, because the Pokémon uses its tail so much, its real hands have become rather clumsy.

alakazam.name: Alakazam
alakazam.description: Alakazam's brain continually grows, making its head far too heavy to support with its neck. This Pokémon holds its head up using its psychokinetic power instead.

alcremie.name: Alcremie
alcremie.description: When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them to berries it's decorated with cream.

alomomola.name: Alomomola
alomomola.description: It gently holds injured and weak Pokémon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.

altaria.name: Altaria
altaria.description: Altaria dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this Pokémon makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.

amaura.name: Amaura
amaura.description: This ancient Pokémon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years.

ambipom.name: Ambipom
ambipom.description: They work in large colonies and make rings by linking their tails, apparently in friendship.

amoonguss.name: Amoonguss
amoonguss.description: They show off their Poké Ball caps to lure prey, but very few Pokémon are fooled by this.

ampharos.name: Ampharos
ampharos.description: Ampharos gives off so much light that it can be seen even from space. People in the old days used the light of this Pokémon to send signals back and forth with others far away.

anorith.name: Anorith
anorith.description: Anorith was regenerated from a prehistoric fossil. This primitive Pokémon once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its two large claws.

appletun.name: Appletun
appletun.description: Eating a sweet apple caused its evolution. A nectarous scent wafts from its body, luring in the bug Pokémon it preys on.

applin.name: Applin
applin.description: It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it's just an apple and nothing more.

araquanid.name: Araquanid
araquanid.description: It usually passes its time in the water. When its belly is full, it stores its subdued prey in the water bubble on its head.

arbok.name: Arbok
arbok.description: This Pokémon is terrifically strong in order to constrict things with its body. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once Arbok wraps its body around its foe, escaping its crunching embrace is impossible.

arcanine.name: Arcanine
arcanine.description: Arcanine is known for its high speed. It is said to be capable of running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night. The fire that blazes wildly within this Pokémon's body is its source of power.

arceus.name: Arceus
arceus.description: According to the legends, this Pokémon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world.

archen.name: Archen
archen.description: Revived from a fossil, this Pokémon is thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon.

archeops.name: Archeops
archeops.description: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.

arctovish.name: Arctovish
arctovish.description: Though it's able to capture prey by freezing its surroundings, it has trouble eating the prey afterward because its mouth is on top of its head.

arctozolt.name: Arctozolt
arctozolt.description: The shaking of its freezing upper half is what generates its electricity. It has a hard time walking around.

ariados.name: Ariados
ariados.description: Ariados's feet are tipped with tiny hooked claws that enable it to scuttle on ceilings and vertical walls. This Pokémon constricts the foe with thin and strong silk webbing.

armaldo.name: Armaldo
armaldo.description: Armaldo’s tough armor makes all attacks bounce off. This Pokémon’s two enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to punch right through a steel slab.

aromatisse.name: Aromatisse
aromatisse.description: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.

aron.name: Aron
aron.description: This Pokémon has a body of steel. To make its body, Aron feeds on iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by eating bridges and rails.

arrokuda.name: Arrokuda
arrokuda.description: If it sees any movement around it, this Pokémon charges for it straightaway, leading with its sharply pointed jaw. It's very proud of that jaw.

articuno.name: Articuno
articuno.description: Articuno is a legendary bird Pokémon that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result, it is said that when this Pokémon flies, snow will fall.

audino.name: Audino
audino.description: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.

aurorus.name: Aurorus
aurorus.description: The diamond-shaped crystals on its body expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit, surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.

avalugg.name: Avalugg
avalugg.description: Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.

axew.name: Axew
axew.description: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.

azelf.name: Azelf
azelf.description: Known as "The Being of Willpower." It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

azumarill.name: Azumarill
azumarill.description: Azumarill's long ears are indispensable sensors. By focusing its hearing, this Pokémon can identify what kinds of prey are around, even in rough and fast-running rivers.

azurill.name: Azurill
azurill.description: Azurill spins its tail as if it were a lasso, then hurls it far. The momentum of the throw sends its body flying, too. Using this unique action, one of these Pokémon managed to hurl itself a record 33 feet.

bagon.name: Bagon
bagon.description: Bagon has a dream of one day soaring in the sky. In doomed efforts to fly, this Pokémon hurls itself off cliffs. As a result of its dives, its head has grown tough and as hard as tempered steel.

baltoy.name: Baltoy
baltoy.description: Baltoy moves while spinning around on its one foot. Primitive wall paintings depicting this Pokémon living among people were discovered in some ancient ruins.

banette.name: Banette
banette.description: Banette generates energy for laying strong curses by sticking pins into its own body. This Pokémon was originally a pitiful plush doll that was thrown away.

barbaracle.name: Barbaracle
barbaracle.description: When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.

barboach.name: Barboach
barboach.description: Barboach’s sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. This Pokémon hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.

barraskewda.name: Barraskewda
barraskewda.description: This Pokémon has a jaw that's as sharp as a spear and as strong as steel. Apparently Barraskewda's flesh is surprisingly tasty, too.

basculin.name: Basculin
basculin.description: Red- and blue-striped Basculin are very violent and always fighting. They are also remarkably tasty.

bastiodon.name: Bastiodon
bastiodon.description: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.

bayleef.name: Bayleef
bayleef.description: Bayleef's neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each tubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.

beartic.name: Beartic
beartic.description: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.

beautifly.name: Beautifly
beautifly.description: Beautifly's favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this Pokémon, just leave a potted flower by an open window. Beautifly is sure to come looking for pollen.

beedrill.name: Beedrill
beedrill.description: Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest—this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.

beheeyem.name: Beheeyem
beheeyem.description: Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three fingers, but those patterns haven't been decoded.

beldum.name: Beldum
beldum.description: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses through Beldum's body. This Pokémon communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.

bellossom.name: Bellossom
bellossom.description: When Bellossom gets exposed to plenty of sunlight, the leaves ringing its body begin to spin around. This Pokémon's dancing is renowned in the southern lands.

bellsprout.name: Bellsprout
bellsprout.description: Bellsprout's thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway to avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, this Pokémon spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.

bergmite.name: Bergmite
bergmite.description: It blocks opponents' attacks with the ice that shields its body. It uses cold air to repair any cracks with new ice.

bewear.name: Bewear
bewear.description: It waves its hands wildly in intimidation and warning. Life is over for anyone who doesn’t run away as fast as possible.

bibarel.name: Bibarel
bibarel.description: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.

bidoof.name: Bidoof
bidoof.description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

binacle.name: Binacle
binacle.description: Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.

bisharp.name: Bisharp
bisharp.description: This pitiless Pokémon commands a group of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility. It then moves in to finish the prey off.

blacephalon.name: Blacephalon
blacephalon.description: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. It’s apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.

blastoise.name: Blastoise
blastoise.description: Blastoise has water spouts that protrude from its shell. The water spouts are very accurate. They can shoot bullets of water with enough accuracy to strike empty cans from a distance of over 160 feet.

blaziken.name: Blaziken
blaziken.description: In battle, Blaziken blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the more intensely this Pokémon’s wrists burn.

blipbug.name: Blipbug
blipbug.description: A constant collector of information, this Pokémon is very smart. Very strong is what it isn't.

blissey.name: Blissey
blissey.description: Blissey senses sadness with its fluffy coat of fur. If it does so, this Pokémon will rush over to a sad person, no matter how far away, to share a Lucky Egg that brings a smile to any face.

blitzle.name: Blitzle
blitzle.description: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.

boldore.name: Boldore
boldore.description: Because its energy was too great to be contained, the energy leaked and formed orange crystals.

boltund.name: Boltund
boltund.description: This Pokémon generates electricity and channels it into its legs to keep them going strong. Boltund can run nonstop for three full days.

bonsly.name: Bonsly
bonsly.description: It prefers arid environments. It leaks water from its eyes to adjust its body's fluid levels.

bouffalant.name: Bouffalant
bouffalant.description: They charge wildly and headbutt everything. Their headbutts have enough destructive force to derail a train.

bounsweet.name: Bounsweet
bounsweet.description: Because of its sweet, delicious aroma, bird Pokémon are always after it, but it’s not intelligent enough to care.

braixen.name: Braixen
braixen.description: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.

braviary.name: Braviary
braviary.description: For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the sky will not stop battling, even if injured.

breloom.name: Breloom
breloom.description: Breloom closes in on its foe with light and sprightly footwork, then throws punches with its stretchy arms. This Pokémon’s fighting technique puts boxers to shame.

brionne.name: Brionne
brionne.description: It gets excited when it sees a dance it doesn’t know. This hard worker practices diligently until it can learn that dance.

bronzong.name: Bronzong
bronzong.description: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.

bronzor.name: Bronzor
bronzor.description: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor's back contained a mysterious power.

bruxish.name: Bruxish
bruxish.description: It burrows beneath the sand, radiating psychic power from the protuberance on its head. It waits for prey as it surveys the area.

budew.name: Budew
budew.description: When it feels the sun's warm touch, it opens its bud to release pollen. It lives alongside clear pools.

buizel.name: Buizel
buizel.description: It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw. When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.

bulbasaur.name: Bulbasaur
bulbasaur.description: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.

buneary.name: Buneary
buneary.description: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.

bunnelby.name: Bunnelby
bunnelby.description: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.

burmy.name: Burmy
burmy.description: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

butterfree.name: Butterfree
butterfree.description: Butterfree has a superior ability to search for delicious honey from flowers. It can even search out, extract, and carry honey from flowers that are blooming over six miles from its nest.

buzzwole.name: Buzzwole
buzzwole.description: Buzzwole goes around showing off its abnormally swollen muscles. It is one kind of Ultra Beast.

cacnea.name: Cacnea
cacnea.description: Cacnea lives in arid locations such as deserts. It releases a strong aroma from its flower to attract prey. When prey comes near, this Pokémon shoots sharp thorns from its body to bring the victim down.

cacturne.name: Cacturne
cacturne.description: During the daytime, Cacturne remains unmoving so that it does not lose any moisture to the harsh desert sun. This Pokémon becomes active at night when the temperature drops.

calyrex.name: Calyrex
calyrex.description: Calyrex is a merciful Pokémon, capable of providing healing and blessings. It reigned over the Galar region in times of yore.

camerupt.name: Camerupt
camerupt.description: Camerupt has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this Pokémon’s back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.

carbink.name: Carbink
carbink.description: Born from temperatures and pressures deep underground, it fires beams from the stone in its head.

carkol.name: Carkol
carkol.description: It forms coal inside its body. Coal dropped by this Pokémon once helped fuel the lives of people in the Galar region.

carnivine.name: Carnivine
carnivine.description: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

carracosta.name: Carracosta
carracosta.description: They can live both in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.

carvanha.name: Carvanha
carvanha.description: Carvanha’s strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this Pokémon.

cascoon.name: Cascoon
cascoon.description: Cascoon makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This Pokémon prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.

castform.name: Castform
castform.description: Castform’s appearance changes with the weather. This Pokémon gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.

caterpie.name: Caterpie
caterpie.description: Caterpie has a voracious appetite. It can devour leaves bigger than its body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this Pokémon releases a terrifically strong odor.

celebi.name: Celebi
celebi.description: This Pokémon came from the future by crossing over time. It is thought that so long as Celebi appears, a bright and shining future awaits us.

celesteela.name: Celesteela
celesteela.description: One of the dangerous UBs, high energy readings can be detected coming from both of its huge arms.

centiskorch.name: Centiskorch
centiskorch.description: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.

chandelure.name: Chandelure
chandelure.description: Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.

chansey.name: Chansey
chansey.description: Chansey lays nutritionally excellent eggs on an everyday basis. The eggs are so delicious, they are easily and eagerly devoured by even those people who have lost their appetite.

charizard.name: Charizard
charizard.description: Charizard flies around the sky in search of powerful opponents. It breathes fire of such great heat that it melts anything. However, it never turns its fiery breath on any opponent weaker than itself.

charjabug.name: Charjabug
charjabug.description: It buries itself in fallen leaves and barely moves, munching away on humus. If you accidentally step on one, you’ll get a shock!

charmander.name: Charmander
charmander.description: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when Charmander is enjoying itself. If the Pokémon becomes enraged, the flame burns fiercely.

charmeleon.name: Charmeleon
charmeleon.description: Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.

chatot.name: Chatot
chatot.description: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.

cherrim.name: Cherrim
cherrim.description: During times of strong sunlight, its bud blooms, its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.

cherubi.name: Cherubi
cherubi.description: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.

chesnaught.name: Chesnaught
chesnaught.description: Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank. It shields its allies from danger with its own body.

chespin.name: Chespin
chespin.description: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.

chewtle.name: Chewtle
chewtle.description: Apparently the itch of its teething impels it to snap its jaws at anything in front of it.

chikorita.name: Chikorita
chikorita.description: In battle, Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, becalming the battling Pokémon and creating a cozy, friendly atmosphere all around.

chimchar.name: Chimchar
chimchar.description: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can't extinguish the fire.

chimecho.name: Chimecho
chimecho.description: Chimecho makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this Pokémon becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.

chinchou.name: Chinchou
chinchou.description: Chinchou lets loose positive and negative electrical charges from its two antennas to make its prey faint. This Pokémon flashes its electric lights to exchange signals with others.

chingling.name: Chingling
chingling.description: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.

cinccino.name: Cinccino
cinccino.description: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur repels dust and prevents static electricity from building up.

cinderace.name: Cinderace
cinderace.description: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.

clamperl.name: Clamperl
clamperl.description: Clamperl’s sturdy shell is not only good for protection—it is also used for clamping and catching prey. A fully grown Clamperl’s shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.

clauncher.name: Clauncher
clauncher.description: They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.

clawitzer.name: Clawitzer
clawitzer.description: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.

claydol.name: Claydol
claydol.description: Claydol are said to be dolls of mud made by primitive humans and brought to life by exposure to a mysterious ray. This Pokémon moves about while levitating.

clefable.name: Clefable
clefable.description: Clefable moves by skipping lightly as if it were flying using its wings. Its bouncy step even lets it walk on water. It is known to take strolls on lakes on quiet, moonlit nights.

clefairy.name: Clefairy
clefairy.description: On every night of a full moon, groups of this Pokémon come out to play. When dawn arrives, the tired Clefairy return to their quiet mountain retreats and go to sleep nestled up against each other.

cleffa.name: Cleffa
cleffa.description: On nights with many shooting stars, Cleffa can be seen dancing in a ring. They dance through the night and stop only at the break of day, when these Pokémon quench their thirst with the morning dew.

clobbopus.name: Clobbopus
clobbopus.description: It's very curious, but its means of investigating things is to try to punch them with its tentacles. The search for food is what brings it onto land.

cloyster.name: Cloyster
cloyster.description: Cloyster is capable of swimming in the sea. It does so by swallowing water, then jetting it out toward the rear. This Pokémon shoots spikes from its shell using the same system.

coalossal.name: Coalossal
coalossal.description: It's usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.

cobalion.name: Cobalion
cobalion.description: It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is sufficient to make even an unruly Pokémon obey it.

cofagrigus.name: Cofagrigus
cofagrigus.description: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.

combee.name: Combee
combee.description: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.

combusken.name: Combusken
combusken.description: Combusken toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. This Pokémon’s legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out 10 kicks in one second.

comfey.name: Comfey
comfey.description: It stretches sticky vines out from its head and picks flowers to adorn itself with. When it doesn’t have any flowers, it feels uneasy.

conkeldurr.name: Conkeldurr
conkeldurr.description: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.

copperajah.name: Copperajah
copperajah.description: They came over from another region long ago and worked together with humans. Their green skin is resistant to water.

corphish.name: Corphish
corphish.description: Corphish were originally foreign Pokémon that were imported as pets. They eventually turned up in the wild. This Pokémon is very hardy and has greatly increased its population.

corsola.name: Corsola
corsola.description: Corsola's branches glitter very beautifully in seven colors when they catch sunlight. If any branch breaks off, this Pokémon grows it back in just one night.

corviknight.name: Corviknight
corviknight.description: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.

corvisquire.name: Corvisquire
corvisquire.description: Smart enough to use tools in battle, these Pokémon have been seen picking up rocks and flinging them or using ropes to wrap up enemies.

cosmoem.name: Cosmoem
cosmoem.description: The king who ruled Alola in times of antiquity called it the “cocoon of the stars” and built an altar to worship it.

cosmog.name: Cosmog
cosmog.description: Even though its helpless, gaseous body can be blown away by the slightest breeze, it doesn’t seem to care.

cottonee.name: Cottonee
cottonee.description: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.

crabominable.name: Crabominable
crabominable.description: It stores coldness in its pincers and pummels its foes. It can even smash thick walls of ice to bits!

crabrawler.name: Crabrawler
crabrawler.description: Its hard pincers are well suited to both offense and defense. Fights between two Crabrawler are like boxing matches.

cradily.name: Cradily
cradily.description: Cradily roams around the ocean floor in search of food. This Pokémon freely extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight tentacles.

cramorant.name: Cramorant
cramorant.description: It's so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it's battling midfight.

cranidos.name: Cranidos
cranidos.description: It was resurrected from an iron ball-like fossil. It downs prey with its headbutts.

crawdaunt.name: Crawdaunt
crawdaunt.description: Crawdaunt has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this Pokémon, making them desolate places.

cresselia.name: Cresselia
cresselia.description: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

croagunk.name: Croagunk
croagunk.description: Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.

crobat.name: Crobat
crobat.description: If this Pokémon is flying by fluttering only a pair of wings on either the forelegs or hind legs, it's proof that Crobat has been flying a long distance. It switches the wings it uses if it is tired.

croconaw.name: Croconaw
croconaw.description: Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible to remove when they have sunk in.

crustle.name: Crustle
crustle.description: It possesses legs of enormous strength, enabling it to carry heavy slabs for many days, even when crossing arid land.

cryogonal.name: Cryogonal
cryogonal.description: They are born in snow clouds. They use chains made of ice crystals to capture prey.

cubchoo.name: Cubchoo
cubchoo.description: Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.

cubone.name: Cubone
cubone.description: Cubone pines for the mother it will never see again. Seeing a likeness of its mother in the full moon, it cries. The stains on the skull the Pokémon wears are made by the tears it sheds.

cufant.name: Cufant
cufant.description: It digs up the ground with its trunk. It's also very strong, being able to carry loads of over five tons without any problem at all.

cursola.name: Cursola
cursola.description: Its shell is overflowing with its heightened otherworldly energy. The ectoplasm serves as protection for this Pokémon's core spirit.

cutiefly.name: Cutiefly
cutiefly.description: Nectar and pollen are its favorite fare. In fields of flowers, it gets into skirmishes with Butterfree over food.

cyndaquil.name: Cyndaquil
cyndaquil.description: Cyndaquil protects itself by flaring up the flames on its back. The flames are vigorous if the Pokémon is angry. However, if it is tired, the flames sputter fitfully with incomplete combustion.

darkrai.name: Darkrai
darkrai.description: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.

darmanitan.name: Darmanitan
darmanitan.description: When one is injured in a fierce battle, it hardens into a stone-like form. Then it meditates and sharpens its mind.

dartrix.name: Dartrix
dartrix.description: This narcissistic Pokémon is a clean freak. If you don’t groom it diligently, it will stop listening to you.

darumaka.name: Darumaka
darumaka.description: Darumaka's droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.

decidueye.name: Decidueye
decidueye.description: It nocks its arrow quills and shoots them at opponents. When it simply can’t afford to miss, it tugs the vine on its head to improve its focus.

dedenne.name: Dedenne
dedenne.description: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.

deerling.name: Deerling
deerling.description: Their coloring changes according to the seasons and can be slightly affected by the temperature and humidity as well.

deino.name: Deino
deino.description: They cannot see, so they bite to learn about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered in wounds.

delcatty.name: Delcatty
delcatty.description: Delcatty prefers to live an unfettered existence in which it can do as it pleases at its own pace. Because this Pokémon eats and sleeps whenever it decides, its daily routines are completely random.

delibird.name: Delibird
delibird.description: Delibird carries its food bundled up in its tail. There once was a famous explorer who managed to reach the peak of the world's highest mountain, thanks to one of these Pokémon sharing its food.

delphox.name: Delphox
delphox.description: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.

deoxys.name: Deoxys
deoxys.description: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon’s chest appears to be its brain.

dewgong.name: Dewgong
dewgong.description: Dewgong loves to snooze on bitterly cold ice. The sight of this Pokémon sleeping on a glacier was mistakenly thought to be a mermaid by a mariner long ago.

dewott.name: Dewott
dewott.description: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.

dewpider.name: Dewpider
dewpider.description: When two Dewpider meet, they display their water bubbles to each other. Then the one with the smaller bubble gets out of the other’s way.

dhelmise.name: Dhelmise
dhelmise.description: It wraps its prey in green seaweed and sucks away their vitality. It only likes to go after big prey like Wailord.

dialga.name: Dialga
dialga.description: A Pokémon spoken of in legend. It is said that time began moving when Dialga was born.

diancie.name: Diancie
diancie.description: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.

diggersby.name: Diggersby
diggersby.description: With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.

diglett.name: Diglett
diglett.description: Diglett are raised in most farms. The reason is simple—wherever this Pokémon burrows, the soil is left perfectly tilled for planting crops. This soil is made ideal for growing delicious vegetables.

ditto.name: Ditto
ditto.description: Ditto rearranges its cell structure to transform itself into other shapes. However, if it tries to transform itself into something by relying on its memory, this Pokémon manages to get details wrong.

dodrio.name: Dodrio
dodrio.description: Watch out if Dodrio's three heads are looking in three separate directions. It's a sure sign that it is on its guard. Don't go near this Pokémon if it's being wary-it may decide to peck you.

doduo.name: Doduo
doduo.description: Doduo's two heads never sleep at the same time. Its two heads take turns sleeping, so one head can always keep watch for enemies while the other one sleeps.

donphan.name: Donphan
donphan.description: Donphan's favorite attack is curling its body into a ball, then charging at its foe while rolling at high speed. Once it starts rolling, this Pokémon can't stop very easily.

dottler.name: Dottler
dottler.description: It barely moves, but it's still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.

doublade.name: Doublade
doublade.description: When Honedge evolves, it divides into two swords, which cooperate via telepathy to coordinate attacks and slash their enemies to ribbons.

dracovish.name: Dracovish
dracovish.description: Powerful legs and jaws made it the apex predator of its time. Its own overhunting of its prey was what drove it to extinction.

dracozolt.name: Dracozolt
dracozolt.description: In ancient times, it was unbeatable thanks to its powerful lower body, but it went extinct anyway after it depleted all its plant-based food sources.

dragalge.name: Dragalge
dragalge.description: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.

dragapult.name: Dragapult
dragapult.description: When it isn't battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.

dragonair.name: Dragonair
dragonair.description: Dragonair stores an enormous amount of energy inside its body. It is said to alter weather conditions in its vicinity by discharging energy from its crystals on its neck and tail.

dragonite.name: Dragonite
dragonite.description: Dragonite is capable of circling the globe in just 16 hours. It is a kindhearted Pokémon that leads lost and foundering ships in a storm to the safety of land.

drampa.name: Drampa
drampa.description: If a child it has made friends with is bullied, Drampa will find the bully’s house and burn it to the ground.

drapion.name: Drapion
drapion.description: It takes great pride in its strength. Even though it can tear foes apart, it finishes them off with powerful poison.

dratini.name: Dratini
dratini.description: Dratini continually molts and sloughs off its old skin. It does so because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach uncontrollable levels.

drednaw.name: Drednaw
drednaw.description: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokémon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.

dreepy.name: Dreepy
dreepy.description: After being reborn as a ghost Pokémon, Dreepy wanders the areas it used to inhabit back when it was alive in prehistoric seas.

drifblim.name: Drifblim
drifblim.description: It carries people and Pokémon when it flies. But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.

drifloon.name: Drifloon
drifloon.description: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.

drilbur.name: Drilbur
drilbur.description: It makes its way swiftly through the soil by putting both claws together and rotating at high speed.

drizzile.name: Drizzile
drizzile.description: A clever combatant, this Pokémon battles using water balloons created with moisture secreted from its palms.

drowzee.name: Drowzee
drowzee.description: If your nose becomes itchy while you are sleeping, it's a sure sign that one of these Pokémon is standing above your pillow and trying to eat you dream through your nostrils.

druddigon.name: Druddigon
druddigon.description: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.

dubwool.name: Dubwool
dubwool.description: Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. You'll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.

ducklett.name: Ducklett
ducklett.description: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.

dugtrio.name: Dugtrio
dugtrio.description: Dugtrio are actually triplets that emerged from one body. As a result, each triplet thinks exactly like the other two triplets. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly.

dunsparce.name: Dunsparce
dunsparce.description: Dunsparce has a drill for its tail. It uses this tail to burrow into the ground backward. This Pokémon is known to make its nest in complex shapes deep under the ground.

duosion.name: Duosion
duosion.description: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.

duraludon.name: Duraludon
duraludon.description: Its body resembles polished metal, and it's both lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that it rusts easily.

durant.name: Durant
durant.description: Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.

dusclops.name: Dusclops
dusclops.description: Dusclops’s body is completely hollow—there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This Pokémon will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.

dusknoir.name: Dusknoir
dusknoir.description: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.

duskull.name: Duskull
duskull.description: Duskull can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may be. Once this Pokémon chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended victim until the break of dawn.

dustox.name: Dustox
dustox.description: Dustox is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this Pokémon are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.

dwebble.name: Dwebble
dwebble.description: It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If that rock breaks, the Pokémon remains agitated until it locates a replacement.

eelektrik.name: Eelektrik
eelektrik.description: It wraps itself around its prey and paralyzes it with electricity from the round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.

eelektross.name: Eelektross
eelektross.description: With their sucker mouths, they suck in prey. Then they use their fangs to shock the prey with electricity.

eevee.name: Eevee
eevee.description: Eevee has an unstable genetic makeup that suddenly mutates due to the environment in which it lives. Radiation from various stones causes this Pokémon to evolve.

eiscue.name: Eiscue
eiscue.description: It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.

ekans.name: Ekans
ekans.description: Ekans curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. Assuming this position allows it to quickly respond to a threat from any direction with a glare from its upraised head.

eldegoss.name: Eldegoss
eldegoss.description: The seeds attached to its cotton fluff are full of nutrients. It spreads them on the wind so that plants and other Pokémon can benefit from them.

electabuzz.name: Electabuzz
electabuzz.description: When a storm arrives, gangs of this Pokémon compete with each other to scale heights that are likely to be stricken by lightning bolts. Some towns use Electabuzz in place of lightning rods.

electivire.name: Electivire
electivire.description: As its electric charge amplifies, blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.

electrike.name: Electrike
electrike.description: Electrike stores electricity in its long body hair. This Pokémon stimulates its leg muscles with electric charges. These jolts of power give its legs explosive acceleration performance.

electrode.name: Electrode
electrode.description: Electrode eats electricity in the atmosphere. On days when lightning strikes, you can see this Pokémon exploding all over the place from eating too much electricity.

elekid.name: Elekid
elekid.description: Elekid stores electricity in its body. If it touches metal and accidentally discharges all its built-up electricity, this Pokémon begins swinging its arms in circles to recharge itself.

elgyem.name: Elgyem
elgyem.description: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent's brain, causing unendurable headaches.

emboar.name: Emboar
emboar.description: It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.

emolga.name: Emolga
emolga.description: They live on treetops and glide using the inside of a cape-like membrane while discharging electricity.

empoleon.name: Empoleon
empoleon.description: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.

entei.name: Entei
entei.description: Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokémon is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.

escavalier.name: Escavalier
escavalier.description: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.

espeon.name: Espeon
espeon.description: Espeon is extremely loyal to any Trainer it considers to be worthy. It is said that this Pokémon developed its precognitive powers to protect its Trainer from harm.

espurr.name: Espurr
espurr.description: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.

eternatus.name: Eternatus
eternatus.description: The core on its chest absorbs energy emanating from the lands of the Galar region. This energy is what allows Eternatus to stay active.

excadrill.name: Excadrill
excadrill.description: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.

exeggcute.name: Exeggcute
exeggcute.description: This Pokémon consists of six eggs that form a closely knit cluster. The six eggs attract each other and spin around. When cracks increasingly appear on the eggs, Exeggcute is close to evolution.

exeggutor.name: Exeggutor
exeggutor.description: Exeggutor originally came from the tropics. Its heads steadily grow larger from exposure to strong sunlight. It is said that when the heads fall off, they group together to form Exeggcute.

exploud.name: Exploud
exploud.description: Exploud triggers earthquakes with the tremors it creates by bellowing. If this Pokémon violently inhales from the ports on its body, it’s a sign that it is preparing to let loose a huge bellow.

falinks.name: Falinks
falinks.description: Five of them are troopers, and one is the brass. The brass's orders are absolute.

farfetchd.name: Farfetch'd
farfetchd.description: Farfetch'd is always seen with a stalk from a plant of some sort. Apparently, there are good stalks and bad stalks. This Pokémon has been known to fight with others over stalks.

fearow.name: Fearow
fearow.description: Fearow is recognized by its long neck and elongated beak. They are conveniently shaped for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves its long and skinny beak to pluck prey.

feebas.name: Feebas
feebas.description: Feebas’s fins are ragged and tattered from the start of its life. Because of its shoddy appearance, this Pokémon is largely ignored. It is capable of living in both the sea and in rivers.

fennekin.name: Fennekin
fennekin.description: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.

feraligatr.name: Feraligatr
feraligatr.description: Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth. In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.

ferroseed.name: Ferroseed
ferroseed.description: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.

ferrothorn.name: Ferrothorn
ferrothorn.description: By swinging around its three spiky feelers and shooting spikes, it can obliterate an opponent.

finneon.name: Finneon
finneon.description: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.

flaaffy.name: Flaaffy
flaaffy.description: Flaaffy's wool quality changes so that it can generate a high amount of static electricity with a small amount of wool. The bare and slick parts of its hide are shielded against electricity.

flabebe.name: Flabébé
flabebe.description: It draws out and controls the hidden power of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds is most likely part of its body.

flapple.name: Flapple
flapple.description: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.

flareon.name: Flareon
flareon.description: Flareon's fluffy fur has a functional purpose-it releases heat into the air so that its body does not get excessively hot. This Pokémon's body temperature can rise to a maximum of 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit.

fletchinder.name: Fletchinder
fletchinder.description: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.

fletchling.name: Fletchling
fletchling.description: These friendly Pokémon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.

floatzel.name: Floatzel
floatzel.description: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.

floette.name: Floette
floette.description: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the power of flowers to battle.

florges.name: Florges
florges.description: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.

flygon.name: Flygon
flygon.description: Flygon is nicknamed “the elemental spirit of the desert.” Because its flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand, this Pokémon is always enveloped in a sandstorm while flying.

fomantis.name: Fomantis
fomantis.description: When the sun rises, Fomantis spreads its four leaves and bathes in the sunlight. The tip of its head has a pleasant aroma.

foongus.name: Foongus
foongus.description: It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.

forretress.name: Forretress
forretress.description: Forretress conceals itself inside its hardened steel shell. The shell is opened when the Pokémon is catching prey, but it does so at such a quick pace that the shell's inside cannot be seen.

fraxure.name: Fraxure
fraxure.description: Their tusks can shatter rocks. Territory battles between Fraxure can be intensely violent.

frillish.name: Frillish
frillish.description: They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.

froakie.name: Froakie
froakie.description: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.

frogadier.name: Frogadier
frogadier.description: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.

froslass.name: Froslass
froslass.description: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees Fahrenheit. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.

frosmoth.name: Frosmoth
frosmoth.description: Icy scales fall from its wings like snow as it flies over fields and mountains. The temperature of its wings is less than -290 degrees Fahrenheit.

furfrou.name: Furfrou
furfrou.description: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.

furret.name: Furret
furret.description: Furret has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slickly squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs, this Pokémon is very nimble and fleet.

gabite.name: Gabite
gabite.description: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.

gallade.name: Gallade
gallade.description: Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.

galvantula.name: Galvantula
galvantula.description: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.

garbodor.name: Garbodor
garbodor.description: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.

garchomp.name: Garchomp
garchomp.description: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

gardevoir.name: Gardevoir
gardevoir.description: Gardevoir has the ability to read the future. If it senses impending danger to its Trainer, this Pokémon is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.

gastly.name: Gastly
gastly.description: Gastly is largely composed of gaseous matter. When exposed to a strong wind, the gaseous body quickly dwindles away. Groups of this Pokémon cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.

gastrodon.name: Gastrodon
gastrodon.description: When its natural enemy attacks, it oozes purple fluid and escapes.

genesect.name: Genesect
genesect.description: This ancient bug Pokémon was altered by Team Plasma. They upgraded the cannon on its back.

gengar.name: Gengar
gengar.description: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.

geodude.name: Geodude
geodude.description: The longer a Geodude lives, the more its edges are chipped and worn away, making it more rounded in appearance. However, this Pokémon's heart will remain hard, craggy, and rough always.

gible.name: Gible
gible.description: It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal heat. Foes who get too close can expect to be pounced on and bitten.

gigalith.name: Gigalith
gigalith.description: The solar rays it absorbs are processed in its energy core and fired as a ball of light.

girafarig.name: Girafarig
girafarig.description: Girafarig's rear head also has a brain, but it is small. The rear head attacks in response to smells and sounds. Approaching this Pokémon from behind can cause the rear head to suddenly lash out and bite.

giratina.name: Giratina
giratina.description: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.

glaceon.name: Glaceon
glaceon.description: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.

glalie.name: Glalie
glalie.description: Glalie has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. This Pokémon has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.

glameow.name: Glameow
glameow.description: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

glastrier.name: Glastrier
glastrier.description: Glastrier emits intense cold from its hooves. It's also a belligerent Pokémon—anything it wants, it takes by force.

gligar.name: Gligar
gligar.description: Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it were sliding. This Pokémon hangs on to the face of its foe using its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, then injects the prey with its poison barb.

gliscor.name: Gliscor
gliscor.description: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

gloom.name: Gloom
gloom.description: Gloom releases a foul fragrance from the pistil of its flower. When faced with danger, the stench worsens. If this Pokémon is feeling calm and secure, it does not release its usual stinky aroma.

gogoat.name: Gogoat
gogoat.description: It can tell how its trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathetic sense lets them run as if one being.

golbat.name: Golbat
golbat.description: Golbat loves to drink the blood of living things. It is particularly active in the pitch black of night. This Pokémon flits around in the night skies, seeking fresh blood.

goldeen.name: Goldeen
goldeen.description: Goldeen is a very beautiful Pokémon with fins that billow elegantly in water. However, don't let your guard down around this Pokémon—it could ram you powerfully with its horn.

golduck.name: Golduck
golduck.description: The webbed flippers on its forelegs and hind legs and the streamlined body of Golduck give it frightening speed. The Pokémon is definitely much faster than even the most athletic swimmer.

golem.name: Golem
golem.description: Golem live up on mountains. If there is a large earthquake, these Pokémon will come rolling down off the mountains en masse to the foothills below.

golett.name: Golett
golett.description: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.

golisopod.name: Golisopod
golisopod.description: The shell covering its body is as hard as diamond. This Pokémon will do anything it takes to win.

golurk.name: Golurk
golurk.description: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokémon by the ancient people who made them.

goodra.name: Goodra
goodra.description: This very friendly Dragon Pokémon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.

goomy.name: Goomy
goomy.description: The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn't dry out.

gorebyss.name: Gorebyss
gorebyss.description: Gorebyss lives in the southern seas at extreme depths. Its body is built to withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of this, this Pokémon’s body is unharmed by ordinary attacks.

gossifleur.name: Gossifleur
gossifleur.description: It anchors itself in the ground with its single leg, then basks in the sun. After absorbing enough sunlight, its petals spread as it blooms brilliantly.

gothita.name: Gothita
gothita.description: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.

gothitelle.name: Gothitelle
gothitelle.description: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.

gothorita.name: Gothorita
gothorita.description: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.

gourgeist.name: Gourgeist
gourgeist.description: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.

granbull.name: Granbull
granbull.description: Granbull has a particularly well-developed lower jaw. The enormous fangs are heavy, causing the Pokémon to tip its head back for balance. Unless it is startled, it will not try to bite indiscriminately.

grapploct.name: Grapploct
grapploct.description: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.

graveler.name: Graveler
graveler.description: Graveler grows by feeding on rocks. Apparently, it prefers to eat rocks that are covered in moss. This Pokémon eats its way through a ton of rocks on a daily basis.

greedent.name: Greedent
greedent.description: It stashes berries in its tail—so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn't notice the loss.

greninja.name: Greninja
greninja.description: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.

grimer.name: Grimer
grimer.description: Grimer's sludgy and rubbery body can be forced through any opening, however small it may be. This Pokémon enters sewer pipes to drink filthy wastewater.

grimmsnarl.name: Grimmsnarl
grimmsnarl.description: With the hair wrapped around its body helping to enhance its muscles, this Pokémon can overwhelm even Machamp.

grookey.name: Grookey
grookey.description: When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat, the sound waves produced carry revitalizing energy to the plants and flowers in the area.

grotle.name: Grotle
grotle.description: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

groudon.name: Groudon
groudon.description: Groudon is said to be the personification of the land itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.

grovyle.name: Grovyle
grovyle.description: The leaves growing out of Grovyle’s body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This Pokémon is a master at climbing trees in jungles.

growlithe.name: Growlithe
growlithe.description: Growlithe has a superb sense of smell. Once it smells anything, this Pokémon won't forget the scent, no matter what. It uses its advanced olfactory sense to determine the emotions of other living things.

grubbin.name: Grubbin
grubbin.description: If you find its nest, you shouldn’t stick your hand inside. You’ll get bitten by an irritated Grubbin.

grumpig.name: Grumpig
grumpig.description: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its psychic power waves for gaining total control over its foe. When this Pokémon uses its special power, its snorting breath grows labored.

gulpin.name: Gulpin
gulpin.description: Virtually all of Gulpin’s body is its stomach. As a result, it can swallow something its own size. This Pokémon’s stomach contains a special fluid that digests anything.

gumshoos.name: Gumshoos
gumshoos.description: Although it wasn’t originally found in Alola, this Pokémon was brought over a long time ago when there was a huge Rattata outbreak.

gurdurr.name: Gurdurr
gurdurr.description: With strengthened bodies, they skillfully wield steel beams to take down buildings.

guzzlord.name: Guzzlord
guzzlord.description: An unknown life-form called a UB. It may be constantly hungry—it is certainly always devouring something.

gyarados.name: Gyarados
gyarados.description: When Magikarp evolves into Gyarados, its brain cells undergo a structural transformation. It is said that this transformation is to blame for this Pokémon's wildly violent nature.

hakamo-o.name: Hakamo-o
hakamo-o.description: It makes noise by clanging its scales together. When the rhythm has reached its peak, Hakamo-o attacks.

happiny.name: Happiny
happiny.description: It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.

hariyama.name: Hariyama
hariyama.description: Hariyama practices its straight-arm slaps in any number of locations. One hit of this Pokémon’s powerful, openhanded, straight-arm punches could snap a telephone pole in two.

hatenna.name: Hatenna
hatenna.description: Via the protrusion on its head, it senses other creatures' emotions. If you don't have a calm disposition, it will never warm up to you.

hatterene.name: Hatterene
hatterene.description: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.

hattrem.name: Hattrem
hattrem.description: No matter who you are, if you bring strong emotions near this Pokémon, it will silence you violently.

haunter.name: Haunter
haunter.description: Haunter is a dangerous Pokémon. If one beckons you while floating in darkness, you must never approach it. This Pokémon will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.

hawlucha.name: Hawlucha
hawlucha.description: Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.

haxorus.name: Haxorus
haxorus.description: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.

heatmor.name: Heatmor
heatmor.description: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durant's steel bodies and consume their insides.

heatran.name: Heatran
heatran.description: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

heliolisk.name: Heliolisk
heliolisk.description: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.

helioptile.name: Helioptile
helioptile.description: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.

heracross.name: Heracross
heracross.description: Heracross charges in a straight line at its foe, slips beneath the foe's grasp, and then scoops up and hurls the opponent with its mighty horn. This Pokémon even has enough power to topple a massive tree.

herdier.name: Herdier
herdier.description: This very loyal Pokémon helps Trainers, and it also takes care of other Pokémon.

hippopotas.name: Hippopotas
hippopotas.description: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.

hippowdon.name: Hippowdon
hippowdon.description: It brandishes its gaping mouth in a display of fearsome strength. It raises vast quantities of sand while attacking.

hitmonchan.name: Hitmonchan
hitmonchan.description: Hitmonchan is said to possess the spirit of a boxer who had been working toward a world championship. This Pokémon has an indomitable spirit and will never give up in the face of adversity.

hitmonlee.name: Hitmonlee
hitmonlee.description: Hitmonlee's legs freely contract and stretch. Using these springlike legs, it bowls over foes with devastating kicks. After battle, it rubs down its legs and loosens the muscles to overcome fatigue.

hitmontop.name: Hitmontop
hitmontop.description: Hitmontop spins on its head at high speed, all the while delivering kicks. This technique is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense at the same time. The Pokémon travels faster spinning than it does walking.

ho-oh.name: Ho-Oh
ho-oh.description: Ho-Oh's feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to bring happiness to the bearers. This Pokémon is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.

honchkrow.name: Honchkrow
honchkrow.description: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."

honedge.name: Honedge
honedge.description: Apparently this Pokémon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.

hoopa.name: Hoopa
hoopa.description: In its true form, it possess a huge amount of power. Legends of its avarice tell how it once carried off an entire castle to gain the treasure hidden within.

hoothoot.name: Hoothoot
hoothoot.description: Hoothoot has an internal organ that senses and tracks the earth's rotation. Using this special organ, this Pokémon begins hooting at precisely the same time every day.

hoppip.name: Hoppip
hoppip.description: This Pokémon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the approach of strong winds, Hoppip links its leaves with other Hoppip to prepare against being blown away.

horsea.name: Horsea
horsea.description: Horsea eats small insects and moss off of rocks. If the ocean current turns fast, this Pokémon anchors itself by wrapping its tail around rocks or coral to prevent being washed away.

houndoom.name: Houndoom
houndoom.description: In a Houndoom pack, the one with its horns raked sharply toward the back serves a leadership role. These Pokémon choose their leader by fighting among themselves.

houndour.name: Houndour
houndour.description: Houndour hunt as a coordinated pack. They communicate with each other using a variety of cries to corner their prey. This Pokémon's remarkable teamwork is unparalleled.

huntail.name: Huntail
huntail.description: Huntail’s presence went unnoticed by people for a long time because it lives at extreme depths in the sea. This Pokémon’s eyes can see clearly even in the murky dark depths of the ocean.

hydreigon.name: Hydreigon
hydreigon.description: The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.

hypno.name: Hypno
hypno.description: Hypno holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis. While this Pokémon searches for prey, it polishes the pendulum.

igglybuff.name: Igglybuff
igglybuff.description: Igglybuff's vocal cords are not sufficiently developed. It would hurt its throat if it were to sing too much. This Pokémon gargles with freshwater from a clean stream.

illumise.name: Illumise
illumise.description: Illumise attracts a swarm of Volbeat using a sweet fragrance. Once the Volbeat have gathered, this Pokémon leads the lit-up swarm in drawing geometric designs on the canvas of the night sky.

impidimp.name: Impidimp
impidimp.description: Through its nose, it sucks in the emanations produced by people and Pokémon when they feel annoyed. It thrives off this negative energy.

incineroar.name: Incineroar
incineroar.description: Although it’s rough mannered and egotistical, it finds beating down unworthy opponents boring. It gets motivated for stronger opponents.

indeedee.name: Indeedee
indeedee.description: It uses the horns on its head to sense the emotions of others. Males will act as valets for those they serve, looking after their every need.

infernape.name: Infernape
infernape.description: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.

inkay.name: Inkay
inkay.description: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.

inteleon.name: Inteleon
inteleon.description: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.

ivysaur.name: Ivysaur
ivysaur.description: There is a bud on this Pokémon's back. To support its weight, Ivysaur's legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it’s a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.

jangmo-o.name: Jangmo-o
jangmo-o.description: It smacks the scales on its head against rocks or against the ground to frighten its opponents. It can also contact its friends with these noises.

jellicent.name: Jellicent
jellicent.description: Its body is mostly seawater. It's said there's a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.

jigglypuff.name: Jigglypuff
jigglypuff.description: Jigglypuff's vocal cords can freely adjust the wavelength of its voice. This Pokémon uses this ability to sing at precisely the right wavelength to make its foes most drowsy.

jirachi.name: Jirachi
jirachi.description: A legend states that Jirachi will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this Pokémon senses danger, it will fight without awakening.

jolteon.name: Jolteon
jolteon.description: Jolteon's cells generate a low level of electricity. This power is amplified by the static electricity of its fur, enabling the Pokémon to drop thunderbolts. The bristling fur is made of electrically charged needles.

joltik.name: Joltik
joltik.description: Since it can't generate its own electricity, it sticks onto large-bodied Pokémon and absorbs static electricity.

jumpluff.name: Jumpluff
jumpluff.description: Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands. The Pokémon descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is floating.

jynx.name: Jynx
jynx.description: Jynx walks rhythmically, swaying and shaking its hips as if it were dancing. Its motions are so bouncingly alluring, people seeing it are compelled to shake their hips without giving any thought to what they are doing.

kabuto.name: Kabuto
kabuto.description: Kabuto is a Pokémon that has been regenerated from a fossil. However, in extremely rare cases, living examples have been discovered. The Pokémon has not changed at all for 300 million years.

kabutops.name: Kabutops
kabutops.description: Kabutops swam underwater to hunt for its prey in ancient times. The Pokémon was apparently evolving from being a water-dweller to living on land as evident from the beginnings of change in its gills and legs.

kadabra.name: Kadabra
kadabra.description: Kadabra emits a peculiar alpha wave if it develops a headache. Only those people with a particularly strong psyche can hope to become a trainer of this Pokémon.

kakuna.name: Kakuna
kakuna.description: Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.

kangaskhan.name: Kangaskhan
kangaskhan.description: If you come across a young Kangaskhan playing by itself, you must never disturb it or attempt to catch it. The baby Pokémon's parent is sure to be in the area, and it will become violently enraged at you.

karrablast.name: Karrablast
karrablast.description: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.

kartana.name: Kartana
kartana.description: This Ultra Beast’s body, which is as thin as paper, is like a sharpened sword.

kecleon.name: Kecleon
kecleon.description: Kecleon is capable of changing its body colors at will to blend in with its surroundings. There is one exception—this Pokémon can’t change the zigzag pattern on its belly.

keldeo.name: Keldeo
keldeo.description: It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.

kingdra.name: Kingdra
kingdra.description: Kingdra lives at extreme ocean depths that are otherwise uninhabited. It has long been believed that the yawning of this Pokémon creates spiraling ocean currents.

kingler.name: Kingler
kingler.description: Kingler has an enormous, oversized claw. It waves this huge claw in the air to communicate with others. However, because the claw is so heavy, the Pokémon quickly tires.

kirlia.name: Kirlia
kirlia.description: It is said that a Kirlia that is exposed to the positive emotions of its Trainer grows beautiful. This Pokémon controls psychokinetic powers with its highly developed brain.

klang.name: Klang
klang.description: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.

klefki.name: Klefki
klefki.description: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.

klink.name: Klink
klink.description: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.

klinklang.name: Klinklang
klinklang.description: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.

koffing.name: Koffing
koffing.description: If Koffing becomes agitated, it raises the toxicity of its internal gases and then jets them out from all over its body. This Pokémon may also overinflate its round body, then explode.

komala.name: Komala
komala.description: It stays asleep from the moment it’s born. When it falls into a deep sleep, it stops moving altogether.

kommo-o.name: Kommo-o
kommo-o.description: When it howls after finishing off its prey, the metallic sounds of its celebrating comrades can be heard from all around.

krabby.name: Krabby
krabby.description: Krabby live on beaches, burrowed inside holes dug into the sand. On sandy beaches with little in the way of food, these Pokémon can be seen squabbling with each other over territory.

kricketot.name: Kricketot
kricketot.description: It chats with others using the sounds of its colliding antennae. These sounds are fall hallmarks.

kricketune.name: Kricketune
kricketune.description: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.

krokorok.name: Krokorok
krokorok.description: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.

krookodile.name: Krookodile
krookodile.description: Very violent Pokémon, they try to clamp down on anything that moves in front of their eyes.

kubfu.name: Kubfu
kubfu.description: Kubfu trains hard to perfect its moves. The moves it masters will determine which form it takes when it evolves.

kyogre.name: Kyogre
kyogre.description: Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can summon storms that cause the sea levels to rise.

kyurem.name: Kyurem
kyurem.description: This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.

lairon.name: Lairon
lairon.description: Lairon tempers its steel body by drinking highly nutritious mineral springwater until it is bloated. This Pokémon makes its nest close to springs of delicious water.

lampent.name: Lampent
lampent.description: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.

landorus.name: Landorus
landorus.description: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as "The Guardian of the Fields."

lanturn.name: Lanturn
lanturn.description: Lanturn is nicknamed "the deep-sea star" for its illuminated antenna. This Pokémon produces light by causing a chemical reaction between bacteria and its bodily fluids inside the antenna.

lapras.name: Lapras
lapras.description: People have driven Lapras almost to the point of extinction. In the evenings, this Pokémon is said to sing plaintively as it seeks what few others of its kind still remain.

larvesta.name: Larvesta
larvesta.description: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.

larvitar.name: Larvitar
larvitar.description: Larvitar is born deep under the ground. To come up to the surface, this Pokémon must eat its way through the soil above. Until it does so, Larvitar cannot see its parents.

latias.name: Latias
latias.description: Latias is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this Pokémon ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.

latios.name: Latios
latios.description: Latios has the ability to make others see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This Pokémon is intelligent and understands human speech.

leafeon.name: Leafeon
leafeon.description: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you'll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.

leavanny.name: Leavanny
leavanny.description: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.

ledian.name: Ledian
ledian.description: It is said that in lands with clean air, where the stars fill the sky, there live Ledian in countless numbers. There is a good reason for this—the Pokémon uses the light of the stars as its energy.

ledyba.name: Ledyba
ledyba.description: Ledyba secretes an aromatic fluid from where its legs join its body. This fluid is used for communicating with others. This Pokémon conveys its feelings to others by altering the fluid's scent.

lickilicky.name: Lickilicky
lickilicky.description: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.

lickitung.name: Lickitung
lickitung.description: Whenever Lickitung comes across something new, it will unfailingly give it a lick. It does so because it memorizes things by texture and by taste. It is somewhat put off by sour things.

liepard.name: Liepard
liepard.description: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.

lileep.name: Lileep
lileep.description: Lileep became extinct approximately a hundred million years ago. This ancient Pokémon attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches approaching prey using tentacles shaped like flower petals.

lilligant.name: Lilligant
lilligant.description: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a trainer does not take good care of it.

lillipup.name: Lillipup
lillipup.description: The long hair around its face provides an amazing radar that lets it sense subtle changes in its surroundings.

linoone.name: Linoone
linoone.description: Linoone always runs full speed and only in straight lines. If facing an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This Pokémon is very challenged by gently curving roads.

litleo.name: Litleo
litleo.description: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.

litten.name: Litten
litten.description: If you try too hard to get close to it, it won’t open up to you. Even if you do grow close, giving it too much affection is still a no-no.

litwick.name: Litwick
litwick.description: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.

lombre.name: Lombre
lombre.description: Lombre is nocturnal—it will get active after dusk. It is also a mischief maker. When this Pokémon spots anglers, it tugs on their fishing lines from beneath the surface and enjoys their consternation.

lopunny.name: Lopunny
lopunny.description: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.

lotad.name: Lotad
lotad.description: Lotad live in ponds and lakes, where they float on the surface. It grows weak if its broad leaf dies. On rare occasions, this Pokémon travels on land in search of clean water.

loudred.name: Loudred
loudred.description: Loudred’s bellowing can completely decimate a wood-frame house. It uses its voice to punish its foes. This Pokémon’s round ears serve as loudspeakers.

lucario.name: Lucario
lucario.description: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.

ludicolo.name: Ludicolo
